vision.notes: Visual capabilities of Pennatulidae are not described in the provided context.

chemoreception.notes: As cnidarians, sea pens likely rely on chemoreception for prey detection and other environmental cues. This is inferred given the sensory biology of other cnidarians.

mechanoreception.notes: As cnidarians, sea pens likely use mechanoreception to detect water currents and physical contact. This is inferred given the sensory biology of other cnidarians.
